name: Royal Kundan Bangles Set
description: Elegant handcrafted bangles embellished with premium Kundan stones arranged in floral patterns. Perfect for weddings and festive wear.

name: Pink Silk Thread Kundan Bangle Set
description: Handcrafted silk thread bangles decorated with Kundan stones, antique coin motifs, and golden detailing. A perfect festive and bridal accessory.

description: Beautiful silk thread bangle set in deep emerald green, embellished with premium Kundan clusters and gold-toned motifs. Ideal for ethnic and festive outfits.

name: Red Silk Thread Kundan Kada
description: Stunning handcrafted red silk thread kada with floral Kundan work and elegant golden motifs. A perfect statement piece for bridal and festive occasions.
